name: Super Breakout (ChrisWebb)
description:
This was the first game I made using the Unity game engine. Using an existing game design allowed me to focus more on learning the ins and outs of the Unity engine and not having to concentrate too much on super clever game design. That said there are a few twists that I added, such as coin collecting, power ups, score multipliers and enemies that shoot projectiles at the player.

Originally it was designed for mobile devices, but was re-engineered for html so it could be hosted here on itch.io.

It's a bit rough around the edges but it is a fully finished game that I am proud of.
